caption.p: Microscopic images of kidney sections under light microscope (40×) after haematoxylin and eosin staining from animals of (a) normal control, (b) Sham control of combination ABCD, (c) Sham control of combination ABD, (d) methotrexate treated animals, (e) nephrotoxic rats treated with ABCD at a dose of 200 mg/kg, (f) nephrotoxic rats treated with ABCD rats at a dose of 300 mg/kg, (g) nephrotoxic rat treated with ABD combination at a dose of 250 mg/kg and (h) nephrotoxic rats treated with Neeri KFT tablet at a dose of 100 mg/kg.
